# Service / Domain Addition Request

**1. Specific Domain(s) (Optional):**
_If you know the specific domains, list them here. If you only know the service name, leave this blank._

>

**2. Service Name (Required):**
_Which service or company do you want to block? (e.g., "ClassLink", "Impero", "New unknown tracker")_

>

**3. Description & Reason:**
_What does this service do? (e.g., "Screen monitoring," "MDM," "Web Filter," "Trackers")_

>

**4. Helpful Links / Context:**
_Please provide a link to the service's website or any documentation. This helps us find the domains to block if you didn't list them above._

>

---

**Confirmation:**

- [ ] I have searched existing issues to ensure this is not a duplicate.
- [ ] I understand that if I don't provide domains, it may take longer for the maintainers to research and add this service.
